entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
